chapters.title: Chapter 47: The Truth of a Viewing
chapters.info: Mara Tomanes, p. 780 (705)—Allegedly an Aes Sedai in Illian under whom Egwene and Elayne are studying. Siuan was friends with her as a girl, but had not even thought of her since she left home. She thought of her when Gawyn demanded to know where Egwene and his sister were, and used her as their excuse to be out of the Tower; Gawyn assumed she could not lie, but the Three Oaths were severed when she was stilled. See also Sanche, Siuan.
